title: I've created a club for Jax EUW Mains
body:
I'm creating a club for Jax EUW mains. There are 3 requirements:
Level 30 On Your Account
Level 5+ Champ Mastery On Jax
Jax Is In Your Top 3 champs
I give you my nickname ZomboZoR JokeR, or give me yours and I can invite you in my club.
The goal of this club will be to regroup Jax mains in EUW servers, have a "Jax" tag next to your nickname and we will have a little community to talk about Jax, create new relationships, and play together. It's a club for all players and all nationnalities (French, English, Espanol, Deutsch, and Italiano)

{{champion:24}} {{champion:24}} {{champion:24}} {{item:3078}}

replies.body: Hey, does the clan still exist? ^^
